long_description: The multiuse GoFit Elevated Chin Up station features an innovative design with 2 bars at different levels so you can get the most out of your at-home workout. The top bar sits higher than most home pull-up bars, allowing full range of motion; bar shape lets you do pull-ups and chin-ups with several different hand positions. Uses leverage and gravity to quickly mount in a standard doorway without screws; fits in doorways that are 32 - 34 in. wide. Station can also be placed on the ground and used for sit-ups, push-ups and dips; clip GoFit Ab Straps (not included) to the station to work on abdominal strength. GoFit Elevated Chin Up station has a 300 lb. weight limit. Includes a laminated exercise booklet and assembly instructions.
short_description: The multiuse GoFit Elevated Chin Up station features an innovative design with 2 bars at different levels so you can get the most out of your at-home workout.
